nodes.text: Hundria Kast was a female Human who served the Alvorine Authority as chief of security of Alvorine City on the planet Alvorine. During the time of the New Republic, the Hutt war criminal Krova was captured by the bounty hunter Langro Dis, and the bounty hunter subsequently corresponded with Kast to arrange for the Hutt's transport to Alvorine, for incarceration by the planetary authorities.
